mapper.update: UPDATE register_queue SET category1 = #{category1}, category2 = #{category2}, owner_id = #{ownerId}, owner_reg_date = #{ownerRegDate}, job_type = #{jobType}, job_proc = #{jobProc}, job_proc_status = #{jobProcStatus}, job_download_start = #{jobDownloadStart}, job_download_end = #{jobDownloadEnd}, job_index_start = #{jobIndexStart}, job_index_end = #{jobIndexEnd}, job_progress = #{jobProgress} WHERE queue_id = #{queueId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO register_queue( ccid, version, category1, category2, owner_id, owner_reg_date, job_type, job_proc, job_proc_status, job_download_start, job_download_end, job_index_start, job_index_end, job_progress, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{ccid}, #{version}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{ownerId}, #{ownerRegDate}, #{jobType}, #{jobProc}, #{jobProcStatus}, #{jobDownloadStart}, #{jobDownloadEnd}, #{jobIndexStart}, #{jobIndexEnd}, #{jobProgress}, NOW() )
